headline: Standard Fees

altFeesLink.title: Click here for early adopters fees

table.action: Client membership, per year (charged after 1 year)
Account membership, per month, first account
Physical card issuance, activation and delivery, first card
Virtual card issuance and activation, first card
Physical card monthly fee, first card
Virtual card monthly fee, first card
Balance inquiry (ATM), physical cards, first event per month
Physical card PIN change, first event per year
Virtual card PIN change, first event per year
Card payment online, domestic*, first 10 transactions
Card payment POS, domestic*, first 10 transactions

notes: *Domestic means the EU Member States, Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway.
**International means other countries and territories other than the EU Member States, Iceland, Lichtenstein and Norway.
**Withdrawals in currency other than card currency are charged as international.
disclaimer: Disclaimer: all fees are subject to change.
